name: Abena Ofori
description: Abena Ofori is a 70-year-old retired teacher living in Accra, Ghana. With a creative mind and an adaptable nature, she often seeks new ways to manage her daily routines, especially in setting up medication reminders due to her growing concerns about health maintenance. Abena prefers simple communication and is motivated by the urgency to ensure she adheres to her medication schedule, though she finds technology somewhat challenging.

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Daily medication reminders upon waking up
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Online app stores or local pharmacy
